biotools.summary: GWAS3D web server computes the probability of genetics variants affecting regulatory pathways and underlying disease/trait associations by integrating chromatin state, functional genomics, sequence motif, and conservation information when given GWAS data or variant list. GWAS3D also provides comprehensive annotations and visualizations to help users interpreting the results.
